docstring:
"""
Helper functions for creating Form classes from Django models
and database field objects.
"""

classes.docstring:
"""
    A ``FormSet`` for editing a queryset and/or adding new objects to it.
    """
classes.name: BaseModelFormSet

classes.docstring: """A formset for child objects related to a parent."""
classes.name: BaseInlineFormSet

classes.docstring:
"""
    A basic integer field that deals with validating the given value to a
    given parent instance in an inline.
    """
classes.name: InlineForeignKeyField

classes.docstring: """A ChoiceField whose choices are a model QuerySet."""
classes.name: ModelChoiceField

classes.docstring: """A MultipleChoiceField whose choices are a model QuerySet."""
classes.name: ModelMultipleChoiceField
